EmailTemplate.description: Email template for Device PEOL form submission
EmailTemplate.name: Device_PEOL_Request_Form_Submission
EmailTemplate.subject: {!Device_PEOL_Request__c.Name} Device PEOL request pending for approval
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Approvers,
A Device PEOL request form is submitted and is now pending for your approval.
Please login and review the request form by clicking the following link:
{!Device_PEOL_Request__c.Link}
Thank you.
